name: Power Pull
description:
Are you ready for battle with Realistic stunning advance physics of Powerful Vehicles like a
Hybrid Tractors, Army Trucks, Jeep, European, Russian giant farming tractors and Trucks.

Simple touch gives a super realistic tug of war.
Feel the High quality graphics each vehicles has unique features.


Pull Hybrid Tractors like AXION, KIROVETS, XERION, LUCTOR
And Armed Vehicles like MAZ537, KRAZ 260, HEMTT , FMTV and M1070
Plus Heavy Duty Trucks like ARTICA, SAURER, X-KIRO, And little WILLY, FORD too.


▶ TOP NOTCH PHYSICS:
▶ GORGEOUS HIGH RESOLUTION VISUALS.
▶ Unique interesting levels
▶ 30 Modern Enemy Vehicles
▶ 16 Hard Power Bosses Battle
▶ 10 - Premium Vehicles
▶ 5 Hybrid tractors
▶ 5 Armed Trucks
▶ 3 Heavy Tanker Trucks

Easy to play tough to master. This is a fun exciting and challenging free tractor and truck pulling game.
